SEARCH
Package edu.uw.pce.advjava.services

Interface Broker

public interface Broker
The broker interface. This is the interface used by investors to create and access their account, and to obtain quotes and place orders.
Author:
Russ Moul

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    close()
    Release resources used by the broker.

  • Method Details

    • getName

      String getName()
      Get the name of this broker.
      Returns:
      the broker's name

    • createAccount

      Account createAccount(String accountName, String password, int balance, String holderName) throws BrokerException
      Create an account with the broker.
      Parameters:
      accountName - the user or account name for the account
      password - the password for the new account
      balance - the initial account balance in cents
      holderName - the name of the account holder
      Returns:
      the new account
      Throws:
      BrokerException - if unable to create account

    • deleteAccount

      void deleteAccount(String username) throws BrokerException
      Delete an account with the broker.
      Parameters:
      username - the user or account name for the account
      Throws:
      BrokerException - if unable to delete account

    • getAccount

      Account getAccount(String username, String password) throws BrokerException
      Locate an account with the broker. The username and password are first verified and the account is returned.
      Parameters:
      username - the user or account name for the account
      password - the password for the new account
      Returns:
      the account
      Throws:
      BrokerException - username and/or password are invalid

    • requestQuote

      Optional<StockQuote> requestQuote(String ticker)
      Get a price quote for a stock.
      Parameters:
      ticker - the stocks ticker symbol
      Returns:
      optional containing quote, or empty if unable to obtain quote

    • placeOrder

      void placeOrder(Order order) throws BrokerException
      Place an order with the borker.
      Parameters:
      order - the order being placed with the broker
      Throws:
      BrokerException - if unable to place order

    • close

      void close() throws BrokerException
      Release resources used by the broker.
      Throws:
      BrokerException - if an error occurs during the close operation
